page.title: 14SPORTS AND GAMES
page.content: Netball is a very popular game and is played in many schools around the country.Netball is played on a court 100 ft long and 50 ft wide.The court is divided into two goal thirds and a centre third.At either end stands a goal post and in the middle third is a circle where the game starts off.In front of the goal post is a semi circle this is called the shooting circle.On each side they have seven players.Playing are:two goal shooters, two goal keepers,one wing attack,one wing defence,one goal attack,one goal defence and one centre.The game starts off by one off by one of the team standing in the second third.She throws the ball to one of her team mates.The idea of the game is to score as many goals as possible.
